data_table.description: Dietary Intake Form, DTIC, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DTIBFLAG
variable.description: 1 = if form is present

variable.name: DTIBCY
variable.description: Contact year

variable.name: DTIB01
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Skim or low fat milk; 8 oz. glass. Q1 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB02
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Whole milk; 8oz. Glass. Q2 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB03
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Yogurt; 1 c. Q3 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB04
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Ice cream; 1/2 c. Q4 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB05
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cottage cheese or ricotta cheese; 1/2 c. Q5 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB06
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other cheeses, plain or as part of a dish; 1 slice or serving. Q6 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB07
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Margarine or a margarine/butter blend; pats added to food or bread. Q7 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB08
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Butter; pats added to food or bread. Q8 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB09
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Fresh apples or pears; 1. Q9 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB10
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Oranges; 1. Q10 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB11
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Orange or grapefruit juice; small glass. Q11 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB12
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peaches, apricots, plums; 1 fresh or 1/2 c. canned or dried. Q12 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB13
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Bananas; 1. Q13 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB14
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other fruits; 1 fresh or 1/2 c. canned, including fruit cocktail. Q14 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB15
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... String or green beans; 1/2 c. Q15 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB16
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Broccoli; 1/2 c. Q16 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB17
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cabbage, cauliflower, Brussels sprouts; 1/2 c. Q17 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB18
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Carrots; 1 whole or 1/2 c. cooked. Q18 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB19
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Corn; 1 ear or 1/2 c. Q19 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB20
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Spinach, collards, or other greens, but do not include lettuce; 1/2 c. Q20 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB21
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peas or lima beans; 1/2 c. fresh, frozen or canned. Q21 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB22
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark yellow, winter squash such as acorn, butternut; 1/2 c. Q22 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB23
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Sweet potatoes; 1/2 c. Q23 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB24
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Baked beans or lentils, dried cooked or canned, such as pinto, black eye, baked beans; 1/2 c. Q24 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB25
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Tomatoes; 1, or tomato juice; 4 oz. Q25 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB26
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chicken or turkey, without skin. Q26 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB27
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chicken or turkey, with skin. Q27 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB28
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Hamburgers; 1. Q28 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB29
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Hot Dogs; 1. Q29 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB30
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Processed meats: sausage, salami, bologna, etc.; piece or slice. Q30 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB31
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Bacon; 2 slices. Q31 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB32
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beef, pork, or lamb as a sandwich or mixed dish, stew, casserole, lasagna, or in spaghetti sauce, etc. Q32 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB33
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beef, pork, or lamb as a main dish, steak, roast, ham, etc. Q33 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB34
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Canned tuna fish; 3-4 oz. Q34 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB35
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark meat fish, such as salmon, mackerel, swordfish, sardines, bluefish; 3-5 oz. Q35 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB36
variable.description: In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other fish, such as cod, perch, catfish, etc.; 3-5 oz. Q36 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB37
variable.description: [Meat].In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Shrimp, lobster, scallops as a main dish. Q37 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB38
variable.description: [Meat]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Eggs; 1. Q38 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB39
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chocolate bars or pieces, such as Hershey's, Plain, M&M's, Snickers, Reeses; 1 oz. Q39 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB40
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Candy without chocolate; 1 oz. Q40 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB41
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Pie, homemade from scratch; 1 slice. Q41 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB42
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Pie, ready-made or from a mix; 1 slice. Q42 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB43
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Donut; 1. Q43 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB44
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Biscuits or cornbread; 1. Q44 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB45
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals].In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Danish pastry, sweet roll, coffee cake, croissant; 1. Q45 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB46
variable.description: In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cake or brownie; 1 piece. Q46 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB47
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cookies; 1. Q47 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB48
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cold breakfast cereal; 1/2 c. Q48 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB49
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cooked cereals such as oatmeal, grits, cream of wheat; 1/2 c. Q49 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB50
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... White bread; 1 slice. Q50 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB51
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark or whole grain bread; 1 slice. Q51 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB52
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peanut butter; 1 tbsp. Q52 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB53
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Potato or corn chips; small bag or 1 oz. Q53 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB54
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... French fried potatoes; 1 serving, 4 oz. Q54 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB55
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Nuts; 1 oz. Q55 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB56
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Potatoes, mashed; 1 c. or baked; 1. Q56 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB57
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Rice; 1/2 c. Q57 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB58
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Spaghetti, noodles or other pasta; 1/2 c. Q58 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB59
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Home-fried food, such as any meats, poultry, fish, shrimp, eggs, vegetables, etc.; 1 serving. Q59 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB60
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Food fried away from home, such as any fish, chicken, chicken nuggets, etc. Q60 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB61
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Coffee, not decaffeinated; 1 c. Q61 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB62
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Tea, iced or hot, not including decaf or herbal tea; 1 cup. Q62 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB63
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Low calorie soft drinks, such as any diet Coke, diet Pepsi, diet 7-Up; 1 glass. Q63 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB64
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Regular soft drinks, such as Coke, Pepsi, 7-Up, ginger ale; 1 glass. Q64 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB65
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Fruit-flavored punch or non-carbonated beverages, such as lemonade, Kool-Aid or Hawaiian Punch; not diet; 1 glass. Q65 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB66
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How often do you eat liver; 3-4 oz. serving. Q66 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB67
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Are there any other foods that you usually eat at least twice per week such as tortillas, prunes, or avocado? Do not include dry spices nor something that has been listed previously. Q67 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB68
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code of first other food. Q68 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB68A
variable.description: List of other food

variable.name: DTIB69
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency of first other food. Q69 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB70
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code of second other food. Q70 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB70A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. List second other food and usual portion size. Q70a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB71
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency of second other food. Q71 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB72
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code of third other food. Q72 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB72A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. List third other food and usual portion size. Q72a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB73
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency of third other food. Q73 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB74
variable.description: What do you do with visible fat on meat. Q74 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB75
variable.description: Type of fat used in frying

variable.name: DTIB76
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code for frying source. Q76 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB76A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand and form for frying. Q76a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB77
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 5] What kind of fat do you usually use for baking? Q77 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB78
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code for baking source. Q78 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB78A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand and form for baking. Q78a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB79A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 6] What brand and form of margarine do you usually use at the table? Q79a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB79B
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What brand and form of margarine do you usually use at the table? Code for margarine. Q79b [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB79C
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What brand and form of margarine do you usually use at the table? Brand for margarine. Q79c [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB80
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What kind of cold cereal do you most often use? (Enter code). Q80 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB80A
variable.description: Brand of breakfast cereal

variable.name: DTIB81
variable.description: Are you currently on a special diet? Q81 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB82
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many years on the special diet. Q82 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB83
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet. Q83 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB84
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many teaspoons of sugar do you add to your food daily? Include sugar added to coffee, tea, cereal, etc. Q84 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB85
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] In cooking vegetables, how often do you add fat such as salt pork, butter, or margarine? Q85 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB86
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] How often is salt or salt-containing seasoning such as garlic salt, onion salt, soy sauce, or Accent added to your food in cooking? Q86 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB87
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many shakes of salt do you add to your food at the table every day? Q87 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB88
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] How often do you add catsup, hot sauce, soy or steak sauces to your food? Q88 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB89
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] How often do you eat special low salt foods such as low salt chips, nuts, cheese, or salad dressing? Q89 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: DTIB90
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. I am going to ask you about wine, beer, and drinks made with hard liquor because these are the three major types of alcoholic beverages. Do you presently drink alcoholic beverages? Q90 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Dietary Intake Form, exam 2]
